Practice Areas

The REJALI LAW FIRM focuses on Criminal Defense, Immigration and obtaining Office of Foreign Asset Control (OFAC) licensing from the U.S. Department of Treasury. If you are a legal permanent resident (LPR/Green Card Holder) or non-immigrant who is facing criminal charges it is imperative to speak to a qualified attorney before making any type of plea in criminal court because most criminal charges can have grave effects on your status. Call us for your FREE consultation.
